content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column video_bg=”yes” video_bg_url=””][vc_column_text]

The sweetest way to say ‘I love you!’ 

For a touch of romance at home, surprise your loved one with Esplanade’s Pink Love Box with two Valentine’s pink heart-shaped desserts made of delicious raspberries, tonka, mascarpone and velvet ruby chocolate.

The gift box with two ruby chocolate pink heart-shaped desserts costs 28 € ⋅ HRK 210,96 and quantities are limited.

 

The gift box can be pre-ordered, please call Le Bistro: +385 1 45 666 11

The order must be confirmed at least an hour before picking it up at Le Bistro.

 

 

The offer is valid on Valentine’s Day, 14 February 2023.
1 € = 7.53450 HRK

 

Published: 13th February 2023

 

 

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][vc_separator][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row]

excerpt.rendered: Surprise your loved one with Esplanade’s Pink Love Box!
